action.action-desc: Mr. Ferguson (for himself and Mr. Carter of Georgia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the National Labor Relations Act to prohibit the preemption of State stalking laws.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Freedom from Union Stalking Act.
The National Labor Relations Act (29 U.S.C. 151 et seq.) is amended by adding at the end the following new section:

Nothing in this Act shall be construed to preempt a law of any State, territory, or the District of Columbia that prohibits, criminalizes, or creates a civil cause of action for stalking, cyberstalking, or harassment.
